item.title: So you want to be a pixel artist?
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

@Frell…or anyone else who has lots of experience in graphics/pixel art.

I’m very interested in becoming a Pixel Artist. I’d like to make indie games, and I would obviously need some form of graphics to obtain that. I’m not interested in making 3D Models (Blender, etc.) I’m interested in Pixel Art. I’d love to see the thoughts in my mind come to life.

However, I don’t see myself as a very artistic person. It’s hard for me to picture in my brain the aspects of a character that I would like to create and how to convert that to a low-amount of pixels. I’m also very scared of the 3D aspect of it all, obviously it’s not the hardcore stuff, but I have trouble figuring out where lighting should go, shading, etc.

I may be stupid for asking this, but will not being a very artistic person hold me back at all from what I want? I’m sure with practice I can figure out the 3D aspect parts (lighting, shading, etc.)

Read full topic
item.source: So you want to be a pixel artist?
